title: [Kids Game] Lucky Farm for Windows [v2.0.2]
description: Lucky Farm is a great way to test your kids memory speed and recall limits as they have fun matching cows, pigs, and other animals cards, and is also somewhat challenging for adults. The goal is to match cards before the timer runs out and don't waste all the remaining turns. Some of the levels move the cards up, down, and some times zoom in an out to test to see if you can follow them. Features an online high scoreboard that allow you to compare your memory against other players from around the world. Lucky Farm contains 20 levels that change the card placement each time the game is played.
